pages.text: $(l)Soul Shards$() are items dropped by mobs in The Vault. They can be automatically collected in unlimited numbers in the $(l)Soul Shard Pouch.$()

Open the $(l)Soul Shard Shop$() (default F7) to exchange Soul Shards for items. The shop refreshes stock every 12 hours and has a server wide stock, meaning if a fellow player buys an item it will be sold out for everyone. $(br2)A $(l)random item$() is always available to buy, where you can even pull an Artifact from.
